00028 #ifndef _Rectangle_H__
00029 #define _Rectangle_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00042     struct _OgreExport Rectangle
00043     {
00044         Real left;
00045         Real top;
00046         Real right;
00047         Real bottom;
00048 
00049         inline bool inside(Real x, Real y) const { return x >= left && x <= right && y >= top && y <= bottom; }
00050     };
00051 
00061     inline Rectangle intersect(const Rectangle& lhs, const Rectangle& rhs)
00062     {
00063         Rectangle r;
00064 
00065         r.left   = lhs.left   > rhs.left   ? lhs.left   : rhs.left;
00066         r.top    = lhs.top    > rhs.top    ? lhs.top    : rhs.top;
00067         r.right  = lhs.right  < rhs.right  ? lhs.right  : rhs.right;
00068         r.bottom = lhs.bottom < rhs.bottom ? lhs.bottom : rhs.bottom;
00069 
00070         return r;
00071     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 #endif // _Rectangle_H__
